name: Iranian Aviation Academy (Aseman Iranian)
about: The Iranian Aviation Academy, also known as Aseman Iranian, is a pioneering institution in Iran's aviation education. Founded in 2004, it was the first aviation school specifically for women, though it now welcomes students of all genders. The academy offers comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), and Instrument Rating (IR) courses, all conducted by experienced and accredited instructors under the supervision of the Civil Aviation Organization. Students receive thorough ground training in subjects like meteorology, aerodynamics, and flight rules, as well as extensive flight training. The academy is committed to producing highly skilled and certified pilots, contributing to the growth and diversity of Iran's aviation industry. With a strong focus on professionalism and safety, the Iranian Aviation Academy is a leading choice for aspiring pilots.
services:
["PILOT TRAINING COURSE
CABIN CREW TRAINING COURSE
Flight Dispatcher Training
Aircraft maintenance training course"]
